DOC.brief_summary: Previous research regard use phenylephrine exclude obese subject ( BMI > 35 ) . This subgroup patient represent large portion obstetric patient population locally nationally . It unclear whether previous research extrapolate obese patient population . This study do compare incidence hypotension , intraoperative nausea vomiting , neonatal acidosis obese patient receive prophylactic phenylephrine infusion versus receive phenylephrine boluses treatment establish hypotension . This study help u determine whether use phenylephrine infusion phenylephrine bolus best way prevent/treat spinal induced hypotension cesarean delivery obese patient .
DOC.brief_title: Preventing Hypotension Parturients With Elevated Body Mass Index ( BMI )
